title.value: Content and removal of main feeding elements by different vegetable bean varieties
Содержания и вынос основных элементов питания различными сортами овощной фасоли

subject.value: etapas de desarrollo de la planta

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Pugachev, R.M., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Bosak, V.N., Belarus State Technological Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The purpose of the realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus study was to examine the contents of major nutrients in common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris) and the tops of vegetable bean, as well as general and specific removal of nutritive elements by vegetable beans at its cultivation on sod-podzolic medium loamy soil. In studies in cultivated sod-podzolic medium loamy soil were found that total nitrogen content in the beans of different varieties of vegetable beans in a phase of technological maturity, averaged 2.76%, phosphorus – 0.70%, potassium – 2.97%, calcium – 0.59%, magnesium – 0.62% in dry matter. Regulatory takeaway of main nutrients from 1 t of marketable products was 7.6 kg (N), 2.3 (P2O5), 10.1 (K2O), 2.1 (CaO) and 2.1 kg (MgO).
